original_title: Alive & Kicking: The Soccer Grannies of South Africa
overview: A group of South African grandmothers are breaking all taboos as they start playing soccer to live an active, healthy & fulfilling lifestyle. Dealing with their own stories of abuse, poverty & neglect, they come together on the pitch.
tagline: The Soccer Grannies of Limpopo, South Africa have found a way to snatch joy from a desperate reality - with a soccer ball.
title: Alive & Kicking: The Soccer Grannies of South Africa
